Result.description:
返回JSON格式的数据集数据：
`{ "cube": { "dimensions": [ { "caption": "客户名称", "dataType": "string", "dimensionType": "standard_dimension", "factColumn": "customer_name", "uid": "N5820f5_customer_name" }, { "caption": "订单编号", "dataType": "string", "dimensionType": "standard_dimension", "factColumn": "order_id", "uid": "N5820f5_order_id" }, ], "measures": [ { "caption": "订单金额", "dataType": "number", "factColumn": "order_amt", "measureType": "standard_measure", "uid": "N5820f5_order_amt" } ], "table": { "customsql": false, "dsId": "261b252d-c3c3-498a-a0a7-5d1ec6cd****", "tableName": "company_sales_record_copy" } }, "datasetId": "5820f58c-c734-4d8a-baf1-7979af4f****", "datasetName": "company_sales_record_copy12", "datasource": { "dsId": "261b252d-c3c3-498a-a0a7-5d1ec6cd****", "dsName": "立三自用", "dsType": "mysql" }, "directory": { "id": "schemaad8aad00-9c55-4984-a767-b4e0ec60****", "name": "我的数据集", "pathId": "schemaad8aad00-9c55-4984-a767-b4e0ec60****", "pathName": "我的数据集" }, "ownerId": "13651626232****", "ownerName": "张三", "rowLevel": false, "workspaceId": "95296e95-ca89-4c7d-8af9-dedf0ad0****", "workspaceName": "测试工作空间" }`
Result.example: 返回JSON格式的数据集数据，详见左侧说明。

Success.description:
返回接口执行结果。取值范围：

- true：执行成功
- false：执行失败

400.errorMessage: The Cube does not exist.
You can only use the %s dataset of the current workspace.
The personal information is invalid.
You must select a data source before selecting the table.
You do not have datasource authorization.
An internal system error occurred.
Your instance has expired.
The specified instance does not exist.
The specified organizational unit does not exist.
The specified user is not in the organizational unit.
An error occurred while verifying parameters.
The parameter is invalid:%s.
The parameter is invalid.
You are not an administrator of this organization.
You must specify the %s parameter.
Your instance version or access key is not allowed to call the API operation, only professional version supports calling.
The specified user does not exist.
Only administrators of the group workspace can perform this operation.
The object you are operating does not exist or has been deleted.
You are not an administrator or API call auth user of this organization.

title: 查询数据集详情
summary: 查询指定数据集的详情，包括所属数据源、目录、以及数据集模型。
description: 其中包括所属数据源、目录、以及数据集模型（包含维度、度量、物理字段、自定义SQL文本、关联关系等信息）。
